description: It was raining all day. The perfect monment for was accompany with friends. I like the flowers.
I am living here for six years. I graduate from the university of this city. I loved it forever no matter what will happen in the future.
My hometown. My soul will come back after I died.
There were a few jokes happened between me and my friend. So embarrassed. :-)
The city is super clean and suitable for all the old man to live in. The Dujiangyan is so grand.
I went here with my two best friends. We visited the grand ice sculpture. Amazing.
The frist trip organized by company. I lived at seaside the frist time. Comfortable and unforgetable.
The second trip organized by company. The most unforgetable experience for me was the vast sky gallery road. So exciting.
I am here for business trip now.
